desc: Beautiful, contemporary ritual objects & guidance make celebrating Shabbat meaningful, approachable and amazing. Each box includes handcrafted wooden candlesticks, a ceramic kiddush cup, an embroidered, linen challah cover, four Shabbat Guidebooks, a set of Conversation Cards and more.

layout.text: Our beautiful, contemporary ritual objects & guidance make celebrating Shabbat meaningful, approachable and amazing.
